document_data.name: Wyrmbones Inn
document_data.mainbody: The '''Wyrmbones Inn''' was an [[inn]] located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The inn stood three storys tall.
document_data.Location: The Wyrmbones Inn  was located in Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]] on the west side of the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]] across from the [[Coffinmarch]].
document_data.Inhabitants: A group of highborn Waterdhavian ladies called the [[Bloodred Crown]] adventured out of the inn's basement.
